issue.title: [C++/Python] Test build with conda's defaults channel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4888](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4888). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We mostly use `conda-forge` as the developers of Arrow but also have some users that would build with packages from `defaults`. As the versions of packages is a bit behind (and sometimes the contents are different), we should also have a docker-test for this channel.
